reviews.review:
Unfortunately the movie doesn't leave you with a good feeling at the end. This is of course because it is just part 1 of a 2 part story. Having followed comic books for a for a couple years and being a fan of superhero cartoons, this is just par for the course. The more epic the storyline the darker and more hopeless the story gets before it is resolved. So understand and can appreciate the story telling, however my friends who have not followed comics and aren't into cartoons felt very unhappy at the end of the movie. Clocking in around 2 1/2 hours, you don't feel rewarded for sticking it.  Some of the fight sequences are just too long and worse than that the camera is all over the place and cutting from shot to shot, you can't actually tell what's going on or even whose winning the fights. Did they have amazing choreography or did the just jump the camera around to make everything look fast??? I don't know.  

On the positive side, Thanos was awesome! His fight sequences were great and really showed off the Titan he is. The writing for him was different than I expected, really humanizing him so you kinda want him to succeed.

The mashup of the Marvel heroes was great and their chemistry for the most part worked pretty well.  The only problem was the interruption of any serious or emotional moment with a jag or joke.  Some where appreciated and others were just like, "huh another joke. It got to where anytime a moment got serious and the emotional music was flowing, you could start counting down 3..2..1...joke.
Boring and awful. Kind of like Barney the Purple Dinosaur decided to become evil and attack Sesame Street.

The movie was entertaining enough but I'm tired of the heros looking like a bunch of babies.  The last Thor movie the hero lost and now you have 12 hero's and they can't beat one guy??  Just a big waste of time.  I don't care what their plans are for future movies, I don't wasted 2 and a half hours to watch a depressing superhero movie.  I won't go see another.

I was completely blown away after watching this movie. Handling this many characters is not a small task but Russo Brothers did an amazing job. Josh Brolin nailed his performance as Thanos , I watched it twice I'm going to watch it again
this will be the best movie ever

It is different from a lot of other marvel movies in others the villains arenâ€™t really that developed and they just do stuff because there villains and you understand why thanos does what he is doing
Great climax of ten years of superhero movies
Awesome as long as the characters who died stay dead! :)
Awesome movie to SUCK so bad. I might be done with the Avengers.
Epic movie of all epic movies! Did not disappoint one bit. Every minute was just awesome.
